title: Húsavíkurvöllur
text: Húsavíkurvöllur (<a href="Icelandic%20language">Icelandic</a>: , regionally also ) is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="H%C3%BAsav%C3%ADk">Húsavík</a>, <a href="Iceland">Iceland</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches and is the home stadium of <a href="%C3%8D%C3%BEr%C3%B3ttaf%C3%A9lagi%C3%B0%20V%C3%B6lsungur">Íþróttafélagið Völsungur</a>. Its capacity is around 2000.
